name: Bricker
effect: Civ loses 1 population, to a minimum of 1.

name: Tanner
ability: When built, draw 3 cards.  Choose one to add to demand.  Put the rest back.
effect: Player who produce food: +4 gold.  Everyone else: lose 1 investment.

name: Baker
ability: Steal 1 gold each round from a player of your choice who does not produce food.
effect: Each players producing science draws a card from the next deck, then discards a card.

name: Wheat Farm
ability: Before events are evaluated, swap two of them.
effect: Each player loses their oldest business.

name: Hunter
effect: Draw a card and add it to the demand pile.

name: Philosopher
ability: Before events are evaluated, you may move one to the demand pile.
